name: Architect & Team
description: An architect analyzes complex features, creates a rigorous implementation plan, then coordinates up to three workers executing in parallel across repos.

roles.name: Architect
roles.description: Analyzes the PRD, creates implementation plan, assigns work, verifies completion

roles.name: Worker 1
roles.description: Executes assigned tasks from the implementation plan

roles.name: Worker 2
roles.description: Executes assigned tasks from the implementation plan

roles.name: Worker 3
roles.description: Executes assigned tasks from the implementation plan

flow: User provides PRD or detailed feature spec
Architect assigns work items to workers
Workers execute in parallel (no file conflicts)
humanRole: Provide the PRD, approve implementation plan, test when requested, resolve push impediments

requiredInputs: PRD, Linear issue, Confluence page, or detailed feature specification
